welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kilinochchi, Sri Lanka! Get ready to explore the rich history and natural beauty of this charming city, known for its ancient ruins and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories.

restaurants.name: Sithi Vegetarian Hotel
restaurants.description: Sithi Vegetarian Hotel is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in the city.
